thread.title: Vocational training for Bisada youths
thread.title_full: Vocational training for Bisada youths - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Vocational training for Bisada youths
text:
GREATER NOIDA: The district administration has decided to provide vocational skills training and financial assistance to jobless youths, including girls, of Bisada and nearby villages. Around 200 youths, mostly in their 20s, have been selected for the first phase of the ambitious programme, based on their interactions with the district officials.
Gautam Budh Nagar district magistrate N P Singh told TOI on Thursday that these youths need proper guidance to be a productive part of the democracy. "Jobless youths can easily be misguided into taking to crime. Society needs to show them the right way," he said.
"The district administration has drawn up a plan to empower jobless youths. We have identified nearly 200 youths from Bisada and nearby villages, including Tatarpur, Piyawali, Ooncha Amirpur, especially in their early 20s, and will offer them vocational skills trainingand subsequently financial assistance to help them start their own business," the DM said.
The district administration, he said, has already held discussions with some banks that will help them fund youths start their own ventures. "Even after helping a youth start a business, the administration will be in touch with them," he said.
"We have been able to convince youths and hope more and more come forward to be part of our programme," Singh added.
